modVersion.name: Version
modVersion.hint: Currently installed module version (can't be changed here).

debug.name: Debug mode
debug.hint: Client-side setting enabling extended debug logging.

forceUniqueTargetToken.name: Force target token selection
forceUniqueTargetToken.hint: Prevent "crunching" when no unique group member has been preselected as the target. Most relevant for scenes that use levels and elevation ("vertical" maps): By "crunching" your party, all group members get teleported to the same position (and elevation!) as the preselected target. Whithout a unique target, a RANDOM member will be used, which may not always be intended (especially when it comes to elevations!). This option prevents that by a warning message.

memberTokenNames#.name: Party # - List of members
memberTokenNames#.hint: Names of all tokens belonging to Party # (comma-separated).

partyTokenName#.name: Party # - Party name
partyTokenName#.hint: Name of the shared tokens of Party #.

hideChatInfo.name: Hide module info in chat window
hideChatInfo.hint: Hides the info text about this module in the chat window on game start, so that it doesn't show up over and over again (deactivate this option to see it again).

animation4Crunch.name: "Crunch" animation (optional)
animation4Crunch.hint: Animation to play when crunching single tokens into party token. Requires installation of J2BA (see Readme).

playAudio4Crunch.name: Play audio on "Crunch"?
playAudio4Crunch.hint: Plays the audio file spedified below, if activated.

audioFile4Crunch.name: Audio file on "Crunch"
audioFile4Crunch.hint: Audio file (relative path) to be played on "Crunch"?

animation4Explode.name: "Explode" animation (optional)
animation4Explode.hint: Animation to play when exploding party token into single member tokens. Requires installation of J2BA (see Readme).

playAudio4Explode.name: Play audio on "Explode"?
playAudio4Explode.hint: Plays the audio file spedified below, if activated.

audioFile4Explode.name: Audio file on "Explode"
audioFile4Explode.hint: Audio file (relative path) to be played on "Explode"?

chatInfoContent.title: Crunch My Party!
chatInfoContent.text1:
"Once there were three little goblins... eager to form a PARTY!
So here's their story..."
chatInfoContent.text2: Easily collapse arbitrary groups of scene tokens (representing parties) into an easy-to-use single "party token", and vice versa. Manage up to 5 separate parties with up to 25 members each!
chatInfoContent.text3: Please refer to the various module preferences under game settings. Find even more details on GitHub
chatInfoContent.footer: This chat card will only be shown once. Activate once more in the module settings if needed.
